resources.string: Swipe right for true, swipe left for false.
Click on the RecyclerViewRow for the answer.
A \'val\' and a \'var\' are the same.
A Unit in Kotlin corresponds to a void in Java.
In Kotlin \'when\' replaces the \'switch\' operator in Java.
The constructor in Kotlin comes after the class title.
To create a method, you use \'fun\'
